memberdef.argsstring: (const bool complement, const char *const fname, int lineno, const char *const fxname) noexcept
memberdef.name: Prevent

briefdescription.para: Enforces preconditions by preventing their complements from occur.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the file being checked.
Number of the line where the check is executed.
Name of the module containing the check.

xrefdescription.para: Check if this is the best way of stalling execution in C++11.

briefdescription.para: Begins the execution of a unit test. Starts a timer.
Ends the execution of a unit test. Stops and reports wall-clock time.
Asserts if the condition required to pass the unit test occurs.

detaileddescription.para: Basic tools to ensure execution correctness, and to assists with unit testing.
